name: Peace was never an Option
description:
DON'T LET THEM IN YOUR LAKE !

In Peace Was Never An Option, you can become a goose named Vincent. This goose, as angry as ever, tries its best to defend its territory, while a hord of humans attack it. 

The goose gets to fight with multiple weapons and to upgrade them to kill as many humans as possible.

If you choose to play, may the odds be in your favor... And kill them all !

COMMANDS :

  • Movement : Z Q S D or the arrows
  • Weapon Change : 1 2 3
  • Skill Tree : A
  • Attack : Left click
  • Magical Honk : Right click
  • Dash : Space
